grantAccess(address,uint256).details: Access can be granted only if the validator contract is valid and has been granted delegation rights.

params.account: The address of the account to be granted access.
params.contentId: The ID of the content for which access is being granted.
The content ID to check access.

returns._0: True if access is allowed, false otherwise.

grantAccess(address,uint256).notice: Grants access to a specific account for a certain content ID based on given conditions.

isAccessGranted(address,uint256).notice: Checks if access is allowed for a specific user and content.
